FuncDef:
The sdh-alarm uni-tuais ces-underrun enable command enables a CPOS interface to send TU-AIS bit streams to an AC-side device when the CES service is interrupted on the interface.
The undo sdh-alarm uni-tuais ces-underrun enable command restores the default configuration.
By default, a CPOS interface is not enabled to send TU-AIS bit streams to an AC-side device when the CES service is interrupted on the interface.
ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
In unstructured data transfer for CES scenarios (SAToP), to enable a local CPOS interface to notify an AC-side device of network-side TDM PW faults on the interface, run the sdh-alarm uni-tuais ces-underrun enable command to enable the CPOS interface to send TU-AIS bit streams to the AC-side device when the CES service is interrupted on the interface.
Precautions
This function cannot be configured when the CPOS interface has been added to an APS group.When the using vc4 command is run on a CPOS interface, this function is not supported.This function is supported on the CR5D00C8CF71/CR5D00C4CF70/CR5D00C2CF70/CR5D00C8CF72/CR5D00C2CF71 subcards.This function cannot be configured on the forth and eighth ports of the CPOS subcard.
